example.text: Her Pa (Howard Duff) is the kind of guy who, while saying grace at the supper table, [*-4] pauses at the word ``sin'' and glares at the daughter he hasn't seen for two decades, because he knows in his heart that she enjoyed what happened in the cold-storage room, and has been indulging the same taste ever since in the fleshpots of Chicago.
